variant.question: The table specifies which dangerous goods may be stowed next to one another in the cargo compartment. - Hazard label/ Classification 1 excl. 1.4S 1.4S 2 3 4.2 4.3 5.1 1 excluding 1.4S see note 3 see note 3 x x x x x 1.4S see note 3 - - - - - - 2 x - - - - - - 3 x - - - - - x 4.2 x - - - - - x 4.3 x - - - - - - 5.1 x - - x x - - Note 1: An "x" indicates that items containing those classes of dangerous goods must be segregated.
